name: Gladiator

skills.name: Cleaving Axe
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns if the target's Turn Meter is more than or exactly 50% full. turns if the target's Turn Meter is less than 50% full.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Capital Punishment
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 2 times at random. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff if the target's Turn Meter is above or equal 75%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +1%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Torture
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Knight Revenant
faction.default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 34 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Gladiator is a rare attack champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
